dmca.title: Science Fiction Writer Complains to Google of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
[private]
Chair, Electronic Piracy Committee
Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers of America
[private]
Golden, CO 80402
[private]@sfwa.org

July 29, 2002

Google, Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Via fax to [private], Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints

Re: Copyright Infringement of the Literary Works of Vonda N. McIntyre

I have been appointed by Ms. Vonda N. McIntyre to represent her in the following matter. Ms. McIntyre owns the copyrights to the work "Of Mist, and Grass, and Sand." It has come to our attention that this literary work is posted as a full text electronic file on your server. This publication is not authorized by the copyright owner, any agent thereof, or any law. The identifying information is set forth below.

The work infringed on this site is: "Of Mist, and Grass, and Sand" and may be found at these URLs on your site:

http://groups.google.com/groups?q=mist+grass +sand+mcintyre&hl=en&lr=&ie =UTF-8&safe=off&selm=ae6j9k%242h6%242%40news.eunet.yu&rnum=1

http://groups.google.com/groups?hl=en&lr=&ie =UTF-8&newwindow=1&safe=off&threadm =ae6j9k%242h6%242%40news.eunet.yu&rnum=1&prev =/groups%3Fq%3Dmist%2Bgrass%2Bsand%2Bmcintyre %26hl%3Den%26lr%3D%26ie%3DUTF-8%26safe%3Dof f%26selm%3Dae6j9k%25242h6%25242%2540news.eunet.yu %26rnum%3D1 (both messages in thread)

Ms. McIntyre respectfully requests that you remove the infringing material immediately and take whatever other action may be required to promptly stop this illegal infringement. Ms. McIntyre understands that pursuant to the following laws -- Digital Millennium Copyright Act - H.R.2281; Public Law: 105-304 (10/28/98)), No Electronic Theft Act (LaMacchia Bill) - H.R.2265 Public Law: 105-147 (12/16/97), Copyright Act of 1976, as Amended (1994) - 17 USCS
dmca.principal_name: Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers of America
